com.usc.bill.repository

Interface StudentProfileRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<StudentProfile,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StudentProfile,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<StudentProfile,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<StudentProfile,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface StudentProfileRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StudentProfile,java.lang.Long>
    To handle CRUD operations on student profile-related data
    Version:
    1.0 11/19/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, STROUD
